segment.source: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer
segment.target: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer

segment.source: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer
segment.target: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer

segment.source: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer
segment.target: How to Use the Self-Service Portal to Regain Access to a Computer

segment.source: The Self-Service Portal is a website that IT administrators configure as part of their Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 deployment.
segment.target: The Self-Service Portal is a website that IT administrators configure as part of their Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 deployment.

segment.source: The website enables end users to independently regain access to their computers if they get locked out of Windows.
segment.target: The website enables end users to independently regain access to their computers if they get locked out of Windows.

segment.source: The Self-Service Portal requires no assistance from Help Desk staff.
segment.target: The Self-Service Portal requires no assistance from Help Desk staff.

segment.source: The following instructions are written from the perspective of end users, but the information may be useful for IT administrators to understand.
segment.target: The following instructions are written from the perspective of end users, but the information may be useful for IT administrators to understand.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: An end user must have physically logged on to the computer (not remotely) at least one time successfully to be able to recover their key using the Self-Service Portal.
segment.target: An end user must have physically logged on to the computer (not remotely) at least one time successfully to be able to recover their key using the Self-Service Portal.

segment.source: Otherwise, they must use the Helpdesk Portal for key recovery.
segment.target: Otherwise, they must use the Helpdesk Portal for key recovery.

segment.source: End users may experience lockouts if they:
segment.target: End users may experience lockouts if they:

segment.source: Forget their password or PIN
segment.target: Forget their password or PIN

segment.source: Change operating system files, the BIOS, or the Trusted Platform Module (TPM)
segment.target: Change operating system files, the BIOS, or the Trusted Platform Module (TPM)

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: If the IT administrator configured an IIS Session State time-out, a message is displayed in the Self-Service Portal 60 seconds prior to the time-out.
segment.target: If the IT administrator configured an IIS Session State time-out, a message is displayed in the Self-Service Portal 60 seconds prior to the time-out.

segment.source: To use the Self-Service Portal to regain access to a computer
segment.target: To use the Self-Service Portal to regain access to a computer

segment.source: In the Recovery KeyId field, enter a minimum of eight of the 32-digit BitLocker Key ID that is displayed on the BitLocker recovery screen of your computer.
segment.target: In the Recovery KeyId field, enter a minimum of eight of the 32-digit BitLocker Key ID that is displayed on the BitLocker recovery screen of your computer.

segment.source: If the first eight digits match multiple keys, a message displays that requires you to enter all 32 digits of the recovery key ID.
segment.target: If the first eight digits match multiple keys, a message displays that requires you to enter all 32 digits of the recovery key ID.

segment.source: In the Reason field, select a reason for your request for the recovery key.
segment.target: In the Reason field, select a reason for your request for the recovery key.

segment.source: Click Get Key.
segment.target: Click Get Key.

segment.source: Your BitLocker recovery key is displayed in the Your BitLocker Recovery Key field.
segment.target: Your BitLocker recovery key is displayed in the Your BitLocker Recovery Key field.

segment.source: Enter the 48-digit code into the BitLocker recovery screen on your computer to regain access to the computer.
segment.target: Enter the 48-digit code into the BitLocker recovery screen on your computer to regain access to the computer.

segment.target: Got a suggestion for MBAM?

segment.target: Use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
